snippet.title: Chapter Zero: The Angel Island Saga // Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/chapter-zero-the-angel-island-saga.1452/

The world is a chaotic, terrifying place, rife with all manner of monsters, warlords and hostile architecture. Thanks to the heroism of a shaman named Ichima, the once nomadic clan of Pachacamac now floats high above it all atop the legendary Angel Island. Before they can save the rest of the world, they first have to conquer the island itself. Today, a young recruit named Ishta initiates their rite of passage as a solider of the clan, in hopes of helping it eventually achieve its goals...

Developed by Blacklightning
